## Subject.next() method

Sends a value to all Subject observers.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
next(value: T): void;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type           | Description    |
| --------- | -------------- | -------------- |
| value     | <code>T</code> | Value to send. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
